description: This file defines the EditorViewModel class, which manages creating, editing, loading, saving, and deleting notes within the Android application. It interacts with the NotesRepository to perform data operations and uses LiveData for reactive UI updates.

classes.name: EditorViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel for handling note creation and editing, maintaining current note data, and performing data operations via NotesRepository.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads a note by its ID and updates the current LiveData.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a new or existing note with the provided details, updating timestamps and invoking a callback upon completion.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID and invokes a callback after deletion.
